meanings.definition: Kind and mild in disposition or manner.
meanings.sent1: She was the gentlest person I had ever met, always smiling and helping others.
meanings.sent2: The gentlest touch of her hand on my shoulder instantly calmed me down.
meanings.sent3: He tried to act tough, but his gentlest attempt at a serious face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gentlest breeze carried the scent of flowers through the open window.
meanings.sent5: The gentlest whisper of the wind in the trees lulled me to sleep.

meanings.definition: Soft and soothing in action or effect.
meanings.sent1: The gentlest music played in the background as we enjoyed our meal.
meanings.sent2: Her gentlest voice was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent3: The gentlest touch of the blanket made the baby smile in her sleep.
meanings.sent4: The gentlest rain fell, bringing a sense of peace to the parched land.
meanings.sent5: The gentlest massage melted away all the tension in my muscles.

meanings.sent1: Even in disagreement, they spoke to each other in the gentlest tones.
meanings.sent2: The gentlest punishment for the mistake was a simple apology.
meanings.sent3: The gentlest reminder from her teacher helped her remember the answer.
meanings.sent4: His gentlest criticism was always constructive and never hurtful.
meanings.sent5: The gentlest warning about the approaching storm kept everyone safe.
